title: Prepared In The Process | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Prepared In The Process | Joel Osteen
description:
We all have dreams and goals for our lives, but most of the time, we have to go through a period of preparation before they come to pass. Don’t give up when you face a delay or disappointment. God is using the process to prepare you for the incredible future He has in store.


Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
